alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 10:52AM CST until February 01 at 11:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Henry IL, Whiteside and Rock Island Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast due to ice jams. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...From this morning to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Water affects some summer cottages along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Ice impacting the entire stretch of the Rock River - Forecast...Ice jam impacts are variable and can fluctuate 1-2 feet from the forecasted crest of 12.5 feet by this afternoon. Impacts could also linger longer than currently forecasted. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1100 AM CST.
